TITLE: Administrative Functions
DEF: Departments and roles that manage the institutional aspects of the educational process
TASK: The Administrative Units and Functions pattern supports the various departments and roles that manage the institutional aspects of the educational process. It primarily aids in ensuring the efficient and effective operation of educational institutions. To excel in the pattern's implementation, common challenges such as communication gaps, lack of transparency, and resource allocation need to be identified and addressed, thus improving overall institutional efficiency and effectiveness.
